name: Alabaster Destrier
description: A smooth, pearly statuette of a running horse.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, the wielder can speak the command word to turn the statuette into a pegasus that accepts neutral or lawful riders. The statuette remains in this form for 1 hour.

name: Amulet Of Secrecy
description: A heavy, flat pendant carved with a lidded eye.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can't be detected by divination magic such as the scrying spell or a Crystal Ball while wearing this amulet.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: You constantly have the sensation of being watched.

name: Amulet Of Vitality
description: A gold amulet with a red ruby teardrop at its center.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Your Constitution stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing this amulet.

name: Armor Of Saint Terragnis
description: Golden plate mail carved from head to toe with warrior angels.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +3 plate mail. Only a lawful worshipper of Saint Terragnis can wear this armor.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Hostile spells that target you are DC 18 to cast. Once per month, you can summon an Avatar of Saint Terragnis (treat as an archangel) to fight by your side for 10 rounds.

name: Armor Of The Oni
description: Black plate mail of lacquered, ironwood panels. The helm's visor is the face of a snarling oni.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 plate mail.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can speak and understand Diabolic. Your melee weapon attacks deal +1 damage.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attacks and spellcasting checks against demons.

name: Bag Of Badgers
description: A gray, fraying sack matted with white, bristly hair.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can reach inside the bag and pull out an angry badger. You can throw the badger up to a near distance. The badger attacks the nearest creature for 3 rounds before waddling away.

name: Bag Of Devouring
description: A worn, leather pouch with tight drawstrings.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: This bag devours and destroys anything placed inside it in 1d6 rounds.

name: Bag Of Holding
description: A worn, leather pouch with tight drawstrings.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: This bag has an interdimensional space inside that can hold up to 10 gear slots.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: Placing this item inside another Bag of Holding or a Portable Hole destroys both items and all held inside them.

name: Bead Of Force
description: A marble with a blue ring of light glowing softly inside it.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can throw this bead at one target up to a near distance. If you hit, the target becomes caught in a resilient sphere spell (pg. 69).

name: Blade Of Vengeance
description: A gray blade with a diamond- cut ruby in the pommel. It whistles sharply with each slice.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +2 bastard sword. Cannot be wielded by undead.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You have advantage on attacks against undead creatures with this sword. You can use the sword to cast turn undead once per day (+4 bonus).

traits.name: Personality
traits.description: Lawful. Grim, suspicious. Forged as a failsafe against the Witch-Kings if they should fall to darkness, which they did. Demands they be slain.

name: Boots Of Dancing
description: Fine, supple boots of sheepskin.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: As soon as you don these boots, you begin cavorting and dancing uncontrollably. You move randomly each turn and must pass a DC 15 Dexterity check to remove the boots.

name: Boots Of Hovering
description: Brown, sturdy boots polished to a sheen. Small, silver wings adorn the heels.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can walk on an insubstantial surface for 1 turn at a time. You fall through the surface if you end your turn on it.

name: Boots Of The Cat
description: Gray, doeskin boots as thin and soft as slippers.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can jump up to a near distance from a standstill. Your checks to move silently are always easy (DC 9).

name: Bracers Of Archery
description: Leather bracers embossed with soaring hawks.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You deal +1 damage with ranged weapons.

name: Bracers Of Defense
description: Steel bracers traced with dwarvish runes of protection.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You get a +1 bonus to your armor class.

name: Braks Book of Misspells
description: A tome bound in ratskin that bears a jagged, glowing rune.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: This spellbook contains one scroll each of acid arrow (pg. 54), fireball (pg. 60), and sleep (pg. 71). When a wizard tries to cast or learn a spell from these scrolls, the spell targets the caster on a success.

name: Braks Cube of Perfection
description: A tiny cube with paintings of goblins on each face, each one depicting transcendence in a physical or mental trait.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Roll the cube by rolling a d6. Your corresponding stat permanently increases to 18 (+4). 1. Strength. 2. Dexterity. 3. Constitution. 4. Intelligence. 5. Wisdom. 6. Charisma. After being rolled, Brak's Cube of Perfection teleports to a random location in the multiverse.

name: Circlet Of Wisdom
description: A thin, silver circlet set with a shimmering, blue pearl.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Your Wisdom stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing this circlet.

name: Cloak Of Elvenkind
description: A hooded, billowing cloak that shifts colors to match its surroundings.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Your checks to hide are always easy (DC 9). Once per day, you can become invisible for 5 rounds. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.

name: Cloak Of The Bat
description: A leathery, black cloak that has a ragged hem and a hood with pointed ears.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can fly a near distance as your movement while in a shadowy area.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: Each time you use the cloak to fly, roll a d20. On a result of 1, you and your gear turn into a small bat for 3 rounds.

name: Crystal Ball
description: A flawless glass orb with roiling images swirling inside it.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Only wizards can use a Crystal Ball. You can use it to cast the scrying spell (pg. 70). If you fail the spellcasting check to cast scrying, the Crystal Ball ceases to function for a day.

name: Dagger Of The Goblin Hero
description: A curved dagger with a half- moon notch at the blade's base.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 dagger.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can speak Goblin. All goblinoid creatures react to you with a friendly attitude.

name: Egg Of The Cockatrice
description: A blue, hard egg as big as a coconut and heavy as a stone.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per week, you can speak a command word that causes a cockatrice to hatch and follow your commands for 5 rounds before flying away. The egg repairs itself over one week.

name: Flying Carpet
description: A richly woven, red carpet with gold tassels.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: The carpet fits two riders (one is the driver). It can fly double near on the driver's turn.

traits.name: Personality
traits.description: Neutral. Playful, mischievous. Enjoys visiting new places and gets restless without a frequent change in location.

name: Gauntlets Of Might
description: Heavy, bronze gauntlets with engravings of Herculean giants.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Your Strength stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing these gauntlets.

name: Genie Lamp
description: A tarnished, brass oil lamp.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Rubbing the lamp causes its resident djinni (50% chance) or efreeti (50% chance) to emerge. A djinni grants its summoner one wish spell (pg. 73) before disappearing. An efreeti does the same, but only after being defeated in combat.

name: Gloves Of Agility
description: Thin, leather gloves that seem to meld with the wearer's hands.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Your Dexterity stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing these gloves.

name: Goblin Bomb
description: A preserved rat stuffed with an explosive charge and a fuse.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can light the bomb's fuse and throw it a near distance. It explodes in 1d4 rounds, dealing 2d8 damage to everything in near range.

name: Greataxe Of The Horde
description: A jagged greataxe carved from a weighty dragon bone.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +2 greataxe.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can turn a regular hit with this weapon into a critical hit.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: Each time you go below half your hit points, make a DC 12 Charisma check. On a failure, you enter a battle rage for 1d4 rounds and must attack the nearest creature.

name: Hat Of Intellect
description: A floppy, pointed hat with a wide brim.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Your Intelligence stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing this hat.

name: Hat Of The Hound
description: A rounded, jaunty bowler hat.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can transform into a mastiff each day for up to 10 rounds total. Your clothing and possessions transform with you.

name: Helm Of Mind Reading
description: A helm carved with brain ridges, a spinal neck-guard, and octopus-like tentacles.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can cast the detect thoughts spell (pg. 58) three times per day (+4 bonus).

name: Horned Helm Of Ramlaat
description: A bloodstained helm made of a ram's skull.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: This helm grants you a +1 bonus to your armor class. You have advantage on any check you make to knock down creatures or objects.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: You feel compelled to headbutt delicate objects.

name: Hourglass Of The Black Sands
description: An ancient hourglass running with obsidian sand.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can turn the hourglass when you cast a spell. The spell's effects last 1d4 rounds longer.

name: Immovable Rod
description: A short, iron rod with a button on one end.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: When you click the button, the rod becomes fixed in space (holds 5,000 lbs). Clicking the button again ends the effect.

name: Jewel Of Barbalt
description: A coconut-sized ruby cut with a thousand facets.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You roll a critical success on an 18-20.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: You roll a critical failure on a 1-3.

name: Kytherian Cog
description: A coin-sized, toothed wheel buffed to a silvery shine.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You start every session with a luck token.

name: Longbow Of The Elven Kings
description: A deeply curved longbow with deer antler reinforcements.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 longbow.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You have advantage on attacks with this bow against unnatural creatures and outsiders.

traits.name: Personality
traits.description: Neutral. Proud, timeless. Believes protecting the natural order is the highest calling. Demands all unnatural creatures be found and slain.

name: Magic Ink
description: A pot of glossy, black ink that disappears as it dries.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: The ink's writing is invisible when cool and can only be seen when warmed up by a nearby source of strong heat. There's enough for 1d4 uses.

name: Memnons Blazing Javelin
description: This golden javelin occasionally blinks and wavers, briefly turning into a bolt of lightning.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 javelin. Can only be wielded by a chaotic being. If you also wield Memnon's Discordant Blade and Memnon's Entropic Armor, it becomes a +3 javelin.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: The javelin always returns to your hand after being thrown. Once per day, when you throw this javelin, you can turn it into lightning as per the lightning bolt spell (no spellcasting check).

name: Memnons Discordant Blade
description: This barbed greatsword's red blade trails a shower of sparks when swung to strike.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 greatsword. Can only be wielded by a chaotic being. If you also wield Memnon's Entropic Armor and Memnon's Blazing Javelin, it becomes a +3 greatsword.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can utterly annihilate one creature of level 9 or less that you damage with this blade. The creature can pass a DC 18 Constitution check to take 3d8 damage instead.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: You cannot relinquish ownership of this blade unless it is taken from you by a creature that defeats you in combat. For each day you do not slay a LV 2 or greater creature with this sword, you lose 1d6 hit points. These are restored only when you kill a LV 2 or greater creature with the sword.

name: Mirror Of Mischief
description: A full-length mirror polished to a gleaming shine. Grinning, silver demons grasp the mirror, their claws forming its frame.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: The first time a humanoid creature looks into this mirror, the mirror creates an evil and malicious duplicate of them. The duplicate can step from the mirror and is an exact copy of the subject (except for magical gear, which looks identical but is mundane in nature). The evil duplicate can live indefinitely outside the mirror. It attempts to sow chaos in the life of the creature it duplicated.

name: Moonwrought Chainmail
description: A luminous jacket of chainmail as lightweight as a silk shirt.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 mithral chainmail.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can speak the armor's command word. You gain a +1 bonus to your next spellcasting check or ranged attack.

name: Necklace Of Charm
description: A gold, fishbone chain that shimmers with subtle beauty.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Your Charisma stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing this necklace.

name: Necrotic Mace Of Withering
description: A wrought iron mace tipped with a heavy, screaming skull. Black ichor runs from the skull's eyes when the mace is used to channel necrotic energy.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 mace. Can only be wielded by a chaotic priest.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: While holding the mace, you can turn cure wounds spells you cast into harmful magic that instead inflicts the same amount of damage it would heal.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: If you use the mace to cast an inverted cure wounds spell, you are haunted by nightmares that night. You must pass a DC 12 Wisdom check during your next rest or gain no benefit from resting.

name: Nightcloak Armor
description: Matte black leathers enchanted to deepen and darken shadows.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 leather armor.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you may choose to automatically pass a Dexterity check to hide.

name: Obsidian Witchknife
description: A glinting, obsidian blade that trails black smoke in thin curls.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +2 dagger. Cannot be wielded by a lawful being.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: When you cast a spell while holding this dagger, you may wound yourself with it. Add the amount of damage you take to your spellcasting check.

name: Onyx Destrier
description: A polished, ebony statuette of a running horse.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, the wielder can speak the command word to turn the statuette into a nightmare that accepts neutral or chaotic riders. The statuette remains in this form for 1 hour.

name: Ophidian Armor
description: Glistening, smooth leather of dappled emerald scales.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 leather armor.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You have advantage on checks to avoid the effects of poison.

name: Pearl Of Power
description: A fat, opalescent pearl glowing with an inner radiance.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you may regain the ability to cast a spell you have lost. This cannot restore a spell lost due to a critical spellcasting failure.

name: Pipe Of The Rolling Hills
description: A long, curved pipe that smells of cloves and resin.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Up to three times per day, regain 1d4 hit points when you smoke this pipe.

name: Pipes Of The Sewers
description: A set of tarnished, brass pan pipes with seven cylinders.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can play these pipes to summon 2d6 giant rats. The rats obey you for d6 rounds, and then they scatter and flee.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: If you stop playing while the rats are present, they turn on you and attack.

name: Portable Hole
description: A black, velvet square of cloth that unfolds into a wide circle.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: The Portable Hole folds open on a flat surface into a 6-foot wide, 6-foot deep hole. It has 20 gear slots of storage. The hole closes when you fold the cloth into a small square.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: Placing this item inside a Bag of Holding or another Portable Hole destroys both items and all held inside them.

name: Potion Of Extirpation
description: An acrid, tarry substance in an iron flask with a lead stopper.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can pour the potion on one object or creature filling up to a close area. The target is utterly removed from reality and cannot be returned by anything short of a wish spell.

traits.name: Personality
traits.description: Chaotic. Protests loudly while being used and never agrees that the target is the right choice for extirpation.

name: Potion Of Flying
description: A sunny liquid with bubbles that flash and pop like tiny stars.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can fly a near distance for 10 rounds when you drink this potion.

name: Potion Of Forgetfulness
description: A pink draught that swirls with a counter-clockwise current.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: If you serve this potion to an intelligent being and that being drinks it, the imbiber permanently forgets one memory of your choosing.

name: Potion Of Giant Strength
description: A clay jar holding a stew of green, leafy sludge.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Your Strength becomes 18 (+4) and you deal x2 damage on melee attacks for 10 rounds.

name: Potion Of Healing
description: A glass bottle with a fizzy, lemon-vanilla liquid inside.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: The imbiber of this potion regains hit points based on their level. LV 0-3: 1d6 hit points. LV 4-6: 2d8 hit points. LV 7-9: 3d10 hit points. LV 10+: 4d12 hit points.

name: Potion Of Invisibility
description: This glass vial appears to be empty, but a liquid audibly splashes around inside it.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: When you drink this potion, you become invisible for 10 rounds or until you attack or cast a spell.

name: Potion Of Legendary Deeds
description: A golden elixir that resonates with a faint, angelic chord.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: When you drink this potion, you gain one level and your XP total resets to zero.

name: Potion Of Polymorph
description: A pickled newt floats in this lavender flask of clear liquid.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: When you drink this potion, it casts the polymorph spell (pg. 67) on you with a duration of 1 hour instead of 10 rounds.

name: Potion Of Vitality
description: A crimson elixir that gently thumps with a heartbeat.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: When you drink this potion, roll your class's hit points die. You permanently gain that many HP.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: If you drink more than one Potion of Vitality in your lifetime, you must pass a DC 18 Constitution check each time or die instantly.

name: Ring Of Feather Falling
description: A pearly ring carved in the likeness of an owl feather.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, the ring can cast feather fall (pg. 60) on you when you fall.

traits.name: Personality
traits.description: Neutral. Fearful of heights. Mentally hoots in an owl-like voice to stay away from the edge of cliffs and pits.

name: Ring Of Fireballs
description: A bronze loop with claws holding a red marble. A fiery miasma swirls inside the glass.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can pluck the glass marble from the ring and throw it up to a far distance, causing a fireball spell (pg. 60) to bloom at the site of impact. The glass marble regrows after you successfully complete a rest.

name: Ring Of Invisibility
description: A simple, gold band polished to a warm shine.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, the ring can cast the invisibility spell (pg. 63) on you.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: There is a cumulative 1% chance each time you rest that your sleep is ruined by apocalyptic nightmares, and you gain no benefit from resting. This resets to a 1% chance each time it triggers.

name: Ring Of Ramlaat
description: A bone-carved ring with a ram skull. Its horns twist forward and red lights glow in its eye sockets.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can enter a rage where you deal double damage for 5 rounds. During the rage, you can't cast spells and enemies have advantage on melee attacks against you.

traits.name: Personality
traits.description: Chaotic. Aggressive, overconfident. Seeks to provoke you and your enemies into battle.

name: Robe Of The Archmage
description: A red silk robe with a wide, gold- hemmed mantle. Golden eyes and moons dust its sleeves.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Only a wizard with the Archmage title can wear this robe. Your unarmored AC becomes 15 plus your Dexterity modifier. Choose three spells you know. Their spellcasting DC is always 11. You have advantage on casting the disintegrate spell.

name: Robe Of The Druid
description: A green velvet robe with a deep hood and hems embroidered with silver leaves and vines.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Only a wizard with the Druid title can wear this robe. Your unarmored AC becomes 15 plus your Dexterity modifier. Twice per day, you can regain the ability to cast one lost spell. You have advantage on casting the shapechange spell. When you cast it, its duration is 1 hour instead of focus.

name: Robe Of The Sorcerer
description: A black leather robe with a shadowed cowl and clawed clasps on thin, mithral chains.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Only a wizard with the Sorcerer title can wear this robe. Your unarmored AC becomes 15 plus your Dexterity modifier. When you cast a spell that deals damage, add your Intelligence modifier to the total. You have advantage on casting the power word kill spell.

name: Scarab Of Protection
description: A brooch made from a horned scarab beetle dipped in gold.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: If you die, make a DC 18 Constitution check. If you succeed, you are unconscious instead of dead.

name: Scimitar Of The Ash Moon
description: This wide, curved blade has a snarling efreeti head on the bronze pommel.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +3 greatsword.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: If you roll a critical hit with this weapon, the target is beheaded. It dies instantly if decapitation would kill it.

name: Shield Of The Crusader
description: A weighty kite shield painted with a faded, crimson cross.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 shield. Can only be wielded by a lawful being.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can speak a prayer to wreathe the shield in holy flames, granting +2 to your AC for 3 rounds.

name: Shield Of The Lion
description: This shield is carved as a roaring lion's face with a flowing mane.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 shield.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can command the lion to animate and bellow a ferocious roar. All hostile creatures within near range must immediately make a morale check.

name: Shortsword Of The Thief
description: A stubby, gray blade riddled with notches and scars.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 shortsword. +2 if wielded by a halfling or thief.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, regain a luck token you just spent.

name: Silver Mace Of Wrath
description: A tarnished, silver mace with seven flanges in the shape of crescent moons.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 mace.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: This weapon deals double damage against creatures with lycanthropy.

name: Sphere Of Annihilation
description: A three-foot, spherical void of pure darkness that hovers above the ground.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: This sphere utterly destroys all matter it touches. Intelligent beings can move the flying sphere a near distance by passing a DC 18 Intelligence check. If multiple creatures vie for control of the sphere, it is a contested Intelligence check instead. Wizards have advantage on this check. The winner moves the sphere a near distance. If the sphere moves into a space occupied by a creature, the being controlling the sphere makes an attack roll against that creature with a +7 bonus. On a hit, the creature is obliterated.

name: Spyglass Of True Sight
description: A brass, telescoping lens with magical runes carved on it.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: When you look through the spyglass, you can see invisible creatures and objects.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: The wielder feels a compulsion to look at everything through the spyglass.

name: Staff Of Healing
description: A knotted, oak stave with a heavy knurl on one end.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 staff.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you can touch a creature with the staff to heal it for 1d6 hit points.

name: Staff Of Ord
description: A tapered, mithral staff that resonates with arcane power. The tip features an upward- looking eye in a circle of runes.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +3 staff. Can only be wielded by a wizard.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Functions as a wand of dimension door (pg. 59), fireball (pg. 60), sending (pg. 70), and telekinesis (pg. 72). Unlike a wand, the staff remains intact if you roll a 1 on your spellcasting checks. Hostile spells targeting you are DC 18 to cast.

name: Staff Of The Cobra
description: A curved scepter tipped with a ruby-eyed, flaring cobra head.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 staff.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: All snakes regard you with a friendly attitude unless you do something to upset them. Once per day, you can throw the staff to the ground. It becomes a giant snake for 5 rounds that obeys your mental commands. If the giant snake goes to 0 HP, it reverts into a staff.

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attacks and casting hostile spells targeting snakes.

name: Sword Of The Ancients
description: A chipped and rusting blade with an oiled leather grip.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +2 longsword.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: The sword is unbreakable and can carve through any material. The owner can summon the sword to their hand if it's on the same plane.

name: The Kytherian Mechanism
description: A towering, brass platform mounted with countless cogs and gears speckled in blue- green rust.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: A handle turns The Kytherian Mechanism's mighty wheels, but it doesn't function until its seven missing Kytherian Cogs are replaced. Once functional, activating the mechanism allows the operator to undo one event of their choosing from history. Then, the seven Kytherian Cogs magically scatter to far-flung locations.

name: The Malediction Infernal
description: A black, leatherbound tome with a grinning demon face embossed on the cover.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: A chaotic being who reads this tome gains a level and learns the Diabolic language. A non-chaotic being who reads this book must pass a DC 18 Wisdom check or lose one level. After being read, the tome teleports to a far-flung location.

name: Tome Mordanticus
description: A hand-drawn bestiary of the multiverse's most notable creatures and people.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: When you read the tome, you learn three True Names (pg. 319) of three beings you choose. Your True Name also appears in the book after reading it.

traits.name: Personality
traits.description: Neutral. Pedantic, fussy. The book constantly tries to escape its owner and can telepathically reach out a near distance to any creature.

name: Tome Of Gehemna
description: A sturdy, russet volume held by metal clasps. A golden eye in a circle adorns the cover.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Each day, a random wizard spell scroll appears inside the tome, replacing the spell scroll from the prior day.

traits.name: Personality
traits.description: Neutral. Instructive, technical. Drones on about the obscure points of spellcasting and has an opinion on every wizard's technique.

name: Tome Of Hadebe
description: A brass-plated book with pages of etched copper leaf.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: The tome contains one each of the following scrolls: burning hands (pg. 56), fireball (pg. 60), and prismatic orb (pg. 67).

name: Trident Of The Seas
description: A three-pronged, mithral harpoon studded with pearls.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +2 spear.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You can breathe underwater, as well as speak to and understand wild sea creatures. Once per day, you can cast control water (pg. 57) with a +4 bonus.

name: True Name
description: The secret, unique name borne by a creature and documented in The Covenant. Few creatures know their own True Names.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: You have advantage on attack rolls and spellcasting checks targeting a creature whose True Name you utter.

name: Wand Of Unlife
description: The knobby finger-bone of a swamp troll steeped in acrid embalming fluid.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: This wand contains the spells animate dead (pg. 54) and create undead (pg. 58).

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: Each time you use the wand to cast a spell, you take 1d4 points of Constitution damage. If you reach 0 Constitution from this effect, you die and turn into a zombie.

name: Wand Of Warding
description: A thin, weighty rod of dark iron inscribed with spiraling runes.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: This wand contains the spells dispel magic (pg. 59) and protection from energy (pg. 68).

traits.name: Curse
traits.description: Each time you fail a spellcasting check with this wand, you also lose the ability to cast a random spell you know until you complete a rest.

name: War Horn Of The Angels
description: An opalescent ox horn capped with a golden mouthpiece.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Only a lawful being can wield the horn. Once per day, you can blow the horn to cast rebuke unholy (pg. 69) with a +4 bonus. A demon or devil who hears the horn has disadvantage on its Charisma check vs. your rebuke unholy spellcasting check.

name: Warhammer Of The Dwarf Lords
description: A boxy hammer with a stout handle and leather throwing strap. It hums with a baritone resonance when spun.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 warhammer. +2 if wielded by a dwarf.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: This weapon has the thrown property (pg. 37) to a near distance. It always returns to your hand after being thrown. Your attacks with this weapon deal double damage against giants.

name: Well Of Many Worlds
description: A dark circle of cloth that seems to create a tunnel through the surface it lies upon.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: The Well of Many Worlds folds open on a flat surface into a 6-foot wide hole. Creatures can jump into the hole once per day each to be transported to a random plane of existence.

name: Wraith Chain
description: A chainmail shirt of black, mithral links that trails a long cloak of writhing shadows.

traits.name: Bonus
traits.description: +1 mithral chainmail.

traits.name: Benefit
traits.description: Once per day, you may cause an attack that hits you to miss instead.
